description: Try our easy to follow Ricotta Sandwich + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ricotta Sandwich + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 corn thins multigrain (for corn thins & avocado)
0.25 red capsicum, diced (for ricotta & veggie sandwich)
0.33 carrot, peeled, grated (for ricotta & veggie sandwich)
3 cherry tomatoes (for ham cheese & tomato skewers)
20g tasty cheese, cut into cubes (for ham cheese & tomato skewers)
40g leg ham, shaved, sliced (for ham cheese & tomato skewers)
0.25 cup Pantalica Ricotta cheese (for ricotta & veggie sandwich)
2 slice wholemeal bread (for ricotta & veggie sandwich)

recipeInstructions.text: Ricotta & veggie sandwich: Place the bread on a clean work surface. Combine ricotta, carrot and capsicum in a small bowl. Spread mixture evenly over one slice of bread.
Top with remaining slice of bread and cut off crusts. Cut into triangles or finger sandwiches.
Pack in an airtight container next to frozen drink or cool brick in lunch box to keep cool.
Ham, cheese & tomato skewers: Thread ham, cheese and tomato alternately onto a short wooden skewer. Corn thins & avocado: 1. Thread ham, cheese and tomato alternately onto a short wooden skewer.
